patthana14.13:4.1: Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:4.2: Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:4.3: Āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.13:5.1: Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:5.2: Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:5.3: Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.13:6.1: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:6.2: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.13:6.3: Āsavañca noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
